    @allure.story("Positive - Get user profile")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.CRITICAL)
    def test_get_user_profile_positive(self, authenticated_api: ApiFacade):
        with allure.step("GET /users/profile"):
            response = authenticated_api._client.get("/users/profile")
        with allure.step("Verify status 200"):
            assert response.status_code == 200
        with allure.step("Validate response fields"):
            data = response.json()
            for field in ["id", "phone", "full_name", "region", "profile_pic",
                          "background_pic", "liked_count", "seen_count", "ads_count",
                          "liked_list", "created_at"]:
